001package armyc2.c5isr.renderer.utilities;
002import android.graphics.PointF;
003
004import armyc2.c5isr.graphics2d.Point2D;
005
006public interface IPointConversion {
007
008    public PointF PixelsToGeo(PointF pixel);
009
010    public PointF GeoToPixels(PointF coord);
011    
012    //public Point2D PixelsToGeo(Point pixel);
013    
014    //public Point GeoToPixels(Point2D coord);
015    
016    public Point2D PixelsToGeo(Point2D pixel);
017    
018    public Point2D GeoToPixels(Point2D coord);
019
020}
